description:
After succeeding in changing the destiny of Mayoi Hachikuji, who was supposed to be the victim of a traffic accident, Koyomi Araragi and Shinobu Oshino returned to August 21st 11 years in the future. There, the two of them find out that their original world had been completely annihilated.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kabukimonogatari: Mayoi Jiang Shi Sono San
傾物語 まよいキョンシー 其ノ參
